name: Project Fame: Idle Empire
description:
Live your dream and build your own beauty and fashion empire! Meet VIPs and get them to support and promote your business! Compete with other players for the title of the most famous businesswoman. This is your personal Project Fame! This app has it all, whether you’re seeking luxury, style or fame!

It's all just a tap away in Project Fame where fame, fortune, ​and love are waiting for you and your girlfriends!

Show the world that you have what it takes to be the next successful businesswoman. Invest your capital to open more and more amazing fashion and beauty businesses.

Have fun, stay beautiful and dream big!

Features:
* COLLECT Fame points
* UPGRADE beautiful buildings and collect VIP keys
* CONNECT with new and existing girlfriends to multiply your income
* AUTOMATE your businesses and earn continuously while you’re away to get rich
* COLLECT hundreds of cool items, each with their own style
* INVEST WISELY with smart decisions on when to upgrade or collect idle profits
* PLAY ANYWHERE! - Free to play online or offline, no connection required.

Be the hero of your own story!

Got questions? Check out our community: https://www.facebook.com/projectfame
Got feedback? We're always happy to hear it: hello@cherrypickgames.com

Privacy Policy: http://cherrypickgames.com/privacypolicy/
Terms of Service: http://cherrypickgames.com/termsofservices/
